org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.mappability.gem

Class GemMappabilityHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.mappability.gem.GemMappabilityHeader

  • public final class GemMappabilityHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    Header from the gem-mappability file format.

    Includes information about:

    1. Parameters used for the gem-mapper/mappability algorithm.
    2. Character-encoding for the values of mappability (range of number of mappings).

    This class expose getters for the parameters and the long Range represented by a concrete character.

      • GemMappabilityHeader

                            int maxMismatches,
                            int maxErrors,
                            int maxBigIndelLength,
                            int minMatchedBases,
                            int strataAfterBest,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Byte,org.apache.commons.lang3.Range<java.lang.Long>> encoding)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        kmerLength - read/k-mer length (mappability argument).
        approximationThreshold - approximation threshold (mappability argument).
        maxMismatches - maximum mismatches (mapper argument).
        maxErrors - maximum errors (mapper argument).
        maxBigIndelLength - maximum indel length (mapper argument).
        minMatchedBases - minimum matched bases (mapper argument).
        strataAfterBest - strata after best (mapper argument).
        encoding - mapping of encodings to long range.
